tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE new_commercial_developments (
    development_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    development_name VARCHAR(255),
    development_address VARCHAR(255),
    development_type VARCHAR(50),
    development_size INT
)

CREATE TABLE small_businesses (
    business_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    business_name VARCHAR(255),
    business_address VARCHAR(255),
    business_type VARCHAR(50),
    business_owner VARCHAR(255),
    business_revenue DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE impact_assessment (
    assessment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    development_id INT,
    business_id INT,
    assessment_date DATE,
    impact_score INT
    -- Foreign Key Constraints
    FOREIGN KEY (development_id) REFERENCES new_commercial_developments(development_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (business_id) REFERENCES small_businesses(business_id)
)

CREATE TABLE CommercialDevelopments ( 
     development_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
     development_name TEXT NOT NULL, 
     development_type TEXT NOT NULL, 
     development_location TEXT NOT NULL, 
     estimated_impact INT NOT NULL 
 );

CREATE TABLE ImpactAssessment ( 
     assessment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
     development_id INT NOT NULL, 
     business_owner_id INT NOT NULL, 
     assessment_date DATE NOT NULL, 
     assessment_result TEXT 
 );

CREATE TABLE SmallBusinesses ( 
     business_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
     business_name TEXT NOT NULL, 
     business_type TEXT NOT NULL, 
     business_location TEXT NOT NULL, 
     business_size TEXT 
 );
CREATE TABLE SmallBusinesses (business_id INT PRIMARY KEY, business_name VARCHAR(255), business_category VARCHAR(255), business_location VARCHAR(255), revenue DECIMAL);
CREATE TABLE CommercialDevelopments (development_id INT PRIMARY KEY, development_name VARCHAR(255), development_type VARCHAR(255), development_location VARCHAR(255), construction_cost DECIMAL);
CREATE TABLE CompetitionAnalysis (analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY, business_id INT, development_id INT, impact_score INT, analysis_date DATE);
CREATE TABLE ImpactAssessment (assessment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, business_id INT, development_id INT, assessment_score INT, assessment_date DATE);
CREATE TABLE AssessmentResults (result_id INT PRIMARY KEY, assessment_id INT, impact_category VARCHAR(255), impact_details TEXT);
